name: Clever Kids: Farmyard Fun
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (UK) (from Ad Blurbs)

"Hi, I'm Sprocket...Join me down on the farm and I'll teach you all about cows, sheep, pigs and other fun animals. Use your Nintendo DS stylus to explore the farmyard and learn everything you need to be a real farmer!"
  • Play a host of fun games: herd sheep, beat maths puzzle, spot the difference, build animal jigsaws and much more!
  • Clever Kids games make learning and development fun for all ages.
